hero.title: Alejandro Canek
hero.description: Over 5 years of experience designing and implementing digital experiences in fintech, custom web invitations, and scalable IT solutions.

about.title: Get to Know Me
about.paragraph1: I‚Äôm a UI/UX Engineer with over 6 years of experience creating digital experiences that combine human-centered design with high-level technical implementation.
about.paragraph2: I‚Äôve worked on projects for fintech, banking, and social events, transforming ideas into scalable, functional, and visually engaging digital products. My approach always prioritizes usability, accessibility, and quality in every detail.

stats.text:
Companies and brands
I‚Äôve collaborated with

tasks: Led the second version of the Wallet, new Design System, brand manual, and UI Kit.
Complete redesign of the company‚Äôs three key products: Checkout, Wallet, and Merchant.
Proposed new interaction architectures and led usability testing through multiple iterations.
Developed an internal platform to convert emails into functional, accessible HTML compatible with all browsers.
Improved technical and visual communication through email, increasing open and click rates.
Implemented the new design system in BBVA Venezuela‚Äôs app using LitElement.
Developed key flows such as balance and transaction inquiries, including filtering and advanced search features.
Built reusable components following best practices in unit testing and componentization.
Integrated with CELLS platform and internal libraries to align with corporate standards.
Fast-track development of two credit products using Next.js and Material UI.
Implemented microfrontends with Gatsby and iFrames, managing data flow between embedded modules.
Led a pet adoption platform, managing client sessions and strategic MVP definition.
Designed the interface in Figma and developed the frontend in Next.js, prioritizing accessibility and modularity.
Participated in over 10 projects for brands such as Intel, Bayern Munich, INEDLA, and LANRESC.
Developed interfaces using SASS, JavaScript, React.js, WordPress, Wix, and Strapi.

contact.description: Available for new projects and collaborations. Whether refining user experience, developing an interface from scratch, or auditing your current product, I‚Äôm here to help. Let‚Äôs talk.

projects.overview:

childs.title: Design & Prototype
childs.description: El dise√±o se desarroll√≥ exclusivamente en Figma, con enfoque mobile-first y principios de dise√±o minimalista. La identidad visual se consolid√≥ con una paleta crom√°tica inspirada en la luz y el contraste:

future.description:
El siguiente paso para Kairos Lighting ser√° extender su ecosistema digital hacia un cat√°logo interactivo de proyectos y una secci√≥n de e-commerce para soluciones lum√≠nicas personalizadas.

projects.overview:

El proyecto parti√≥ de la necesidad de resolver problemas de transparencia, compatibilidad y acceso a informaci√≥n confiable. Se desarroll√≥ una plataforma web que combina un test de compatibilidad, un sistema de gesti√≥n de refugios y herramientas de seguimiento post-adopci√≥n.

insights: El 78% de los encuestados prefer√≠a adoptar, pero desconfiaba de los procesos actuales.
